data.name: Battle of Puerto Caballos
data.agents_sp: Capt Juan de Monasterios, Francisco Ferrufino 2 Galleons 100 militia
data.agents_nsp0: Christopher Newport, Michael Geare 8 Ships 400 men
data.prim_n: GUATEMALA,11 [Criado de Castilla al Rey a 30 Apr 1603] / GUATEMALA,39 [Alvarado a Rey a 20 mar 1603] / SANTO_DOMINGO,129,R.3 [Relación de Haze a 5 sep 1603 / Valdés a Rey a 6 jun 1603] / INDIFERENTE,1866 [Consulta a 3 jul 1603] / Fuentes 2 305-306
data.lit_n: Marley 144-145 / Lujan 2 472 / Rodriguez C 17-18 / Andrews B 166, 184
data.note:
1592 Christopher Newport assaults Caribbean coast of CA / 1595 Pirate Geremías el Francés assaults Caribbean coast of CA / 1603 Truxillo. Pie de Palo and Diego el Mulatto assault Truxillo, with Capt Juan de Monasterios Bide defending /v Lujan 2 822-823
 Inc Pie de Palo and Diego el Mulato? And 4 Eng buccaneer attacks in 1590s / page 316 of Link: https://link.gale.com/apps/doc/U0104495763/MOME?u=camb55135&sid=MOME&xid=d3efa3b2 / Link: https://www.afehc-historia-centroamericana.org/index-php/_action_fi_aff_id_2531.html
